title: 05/25/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 05/25/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
After Aaron Rodgers spoke about his relationship with the Packers, Colin explains why this has evolved into an unsalvageable situation. He identifies which NBA team in the playoffs right now is clearly a mirage based on their past “success”. He also has bad news for Packer fans and the reality they are facing when it comes to contending for another Super Bowl. Plus, 2x All Pro running back Christian McCaffrey joins the show to talk about his new QB Sam Darnold and his versatility as a receiver in today’s NFL.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
